Address.value: 1603 LBJ FREEWAY,SUITE 800, DALLAS, Texas, 75234, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Income Opportunity Realty Investors Inc is a US-based company that is engaged in investing in real estate and financing real estate and real estate-related activities through investments in mortgage loans. The principal business activity of the company is investing in equity interests in real estate through direct equity investments and partnerships and financing real estate and real estate-related activities through investments in mortgage loans. The company's real estate is located in the southwest region of the continental United States.
